allow: Bash(git filter-branch --msg-filter 'sed """"/ü§ñ Generated with/d"""" | sed """"/Co-Authored-By: Claude/d"""" | sed -e :a -e """"/^\n*$/{ $d; N; ba"""" -e """"}""""' -- --all)

Bash(timeout 600 bash -c 'while true; do echo ""=== Testing at $(date +%H:%M:%S) ===""; response=$(curl -s http://54.161.67.120:3000/build-items/reseed -X POST 2>&1); echo ""$response""; if echo ""$response"" | grep -q ""Successfully reseeded""; then echo ""‚úÖ SUCCESS! Items loaded!""; break; elif echo ""$response"" | grep -q ""500""; then echo ""‚è≥ Still old image, waiting 45s...""; sleep 45; else echo ""‚ö†Ô∏è Unexpected response: $response""; sleep 30; fi; done')

Bash(timeout 600 bash -c 'while true; do echo ""=== Testing at $(date +%H:%M:%S) ===""; response=$(curl -s http://54.161.67.120:3000/build-items/clear-all -X POST 2>&1); echo ""$response""; if echo ""$response"" | grep -q ""Cleared""; then echo ""‚úÖ SUCCESS! Items cleared!""; break; elif echo ""$response"" | grep -q ""500""; then echo ""‚è≥ Endpoint not deployed yet, waiting 30s...""; sleep 30; else echo ""‚ö†Ô∏è Response: $response""; sleep 30; fi; done')

Bash(timeout 600 bash -c 'echo ""Aguardando deploy...""; sleep 120; echo ""=== Testando Password Recovery ===""; echo ""1. Forgot Password:""; response=$(curl -s -X POST http://54.161.67.120:3000/auth/forgot-password -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""email\"":\""teste@gmail.com\""}"" 2>&1); echo ""$response""; if echo ""$response"" | grep -q ""token""; then token=$(echo ""$response"" | grep -o ""\""token\"":\""[^\""]*\"""" | cut -d""\"""" -f4); echo ""Token obtido: $token""; echo """"; echo ""2. Reset Password com token:""; curl -s -X POST http://54.161.67.120:3000/auth/reset-password -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\""token\"":\""$token\"",\""newPassword\"":\""123456\""}""; echo """"; echo ""‚úÖ Password Recovery testado!""; else echo ""‚ùå Erro no forgot-password""; fi')
